thread.section_title: Town Fair Tire Centers, Inc Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Town Fair Tire Centers, Inc | www.townfairtire.com
thread.title: Mara Briere
thread.title_full: Town Fair Tire Centers, Inc reviewed by Mara Briere

author: Mara Briere
title: Mara Briere
text: I went online to find out about new all around radials for my car. I checked into the various options and then settled on Town Fair Tire Center because they offered the most complete package and best prices. From speaking with a polite and professional customer support specialist to picking up my car, the experience was smooth. The staff at the Billerica center were exceptional in explaining the services, the extra options, and did not pressure me one or another. They made sure that I understood the benefits that extend beyond purchase! Great/
